com.bsuuv.grocerymanager.ui.util

Class FoodItemCreationRequirementChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bsuuv.grocerymanager.ui.util.FoodItemCreationRequirementChecker

  • public class FoodItemCreationRequirementChecker
extends Object
    Utility class containing logic to check that given food-item properties fit their requirements. This class is used in NewFoodItemActivity to validate the values in its input fields.

    • Nested Class Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean requirementsMet(String label, int amount, TimeFrame timeFrame, int frequency, double frequencyQuotient)
      The requirements are as follows: Label must not be empty Amount must be greater than zero TimeFrame must not equal TimeFrame.NULL Frequency must be greater than zero Frequency quotient must not be more than 1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • FoodItemCreationRequirementChecker

    • Method Detail

      • requirementsMet

        public boolean requirementsMet(String label,
                               int amount,
                               TimeFrame timeFrame,
                               int frequency,
                               double frequencyQuotient)
                        throws FoodItemCreationRequirementChecker.RequirementNotMetException
        The requirements are as follows:
        • Label must not be empty
        • Amount must be greater than zero
        • TimeFrame must not equal TimeFrame.NULL
        • Frequency must be greater than zero
        • Frequency quotient must not be more than 1.0
        Parameters:
        label - Label of the food-item
        amount - Amount of the food-item
        timeFrame - Time frame property of the food-item (see TimeFrame).
        frequency - Frequency property of the food-item
        frequencyQuotient - Frequency quotient of the food-item (see FrequencyQuotientCalculator).
        Returns:
        Boolean telling if all of the requirements were met.
        Throws:
        FoodItemCreationRequirementChecker.RequirementNotMetException - An exception with message telling which of the requirements was not met.
